summary: After being hit by a car, a woman comes home to realize her friends don't really want to take care of her. Desperate for help, she turns to an unlikely source.
cast: Leslie Bibb|Kevin Curtis|Nadia Dajani|Betty Gilpin|Michael Godere|Marin Ireland|Danielle Kronenberg|Tracee Chimo Pallero|Elizabeth Rodriguez|Thomas Sadoski|Michael Stahl-David|Yul Vazquez|Tim Wu|Heena Shim
title: Take Care
